member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorAddFourierAttributes
member.summary:
Visits each node of the abstract syntax tree of a regular expression and adds FourierFunctions to the symbols.
Therefore, each input symbol must contain a RandomVariable attribute.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log: RegExASTVisitorAddFourierAttributes.cs,v $ Revision 1.1 2005/10/11 22:31:12 helgeh *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:20 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorAddFourierAttributes.VisitISymbol(Palladio.RegularExpressions.ISymbol)
member.summary: Converts the RandomVariable to a FourierFunction.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log: AbstractRegExASTVisitor.cs,v $ Revision 1.3 2005/12/04 18:41:21 helgeh - Simplified DiscreteFourierFunction.Calculate LoopLimit - added new attribute MaximumExecutionTimeAttribute - replaced AbstractRegExASTVisitor.DetermineMaxTime by a new visitor RegExASTVisitorDetermineMaxTime
Revision 1.2 2005/10/11 22:05:14 helgeh - Added NUnit project and NDoc documentation. - fixed a bug in AdjustSamplingRate
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:20 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.IRegExASTVisitor
member.summary: Interface for regular expression abstract syntax tree visitor.

Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:20 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.

Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.IRegExASTVisitor.Random
member.summary: The RandomVariable contains the result of the calculation after the visitor was started.

member.name: F:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.AbstractRegExASTVisitor.epsilon
member.summary: Precision for calculating the loop limit.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.AbstractRegExASTVisitor.#ctor(System.Double)
member.param: Precision for calculating the loop limit.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.AbstractRegExASTVisitor.ValidateLoopProbability(System.Double)
member.summary: The probability of reiterating the loop must be a value in [0,1[. IF the probability is out of range, an exception is thrown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.AbstractRegExASTVisitor.DetermineNumberOfIterationsForLoop(System.Double)
member.summary: For a given loop probability and an epsilon the function returns the number of loop iterations, so the total probability of the loop is 1-epsilon.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.AbstractRegExASTVisitor.VisitObject(System.Object)
member.summary: The default function which is called if no "VisitTYPE" method is found by the reflection API
member.param: The object calling the unknown visitor function

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.AbstractRegExASTVisitor.Epsilon
member.summary: Precision for calculating the loop limit.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorDetermineProbabilitiesAndMaxValue
member.summary:
Visits each node of the abstract syntax tree of a regular expression and determines the probability for each expression. Also the maximum x-value of the result is calculated
Therefore, serveral requirements must be fullfilled: - each input symbol must contain a RandomVariable attribute. - each input symbol must contain a ProbabilityAttribute

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log: RegExASTVisitorDetermineProbabilitiesAndMaxValue.cs,v $ Revision 1.2 2005/12/04 18:41:21 helgeh - Simplified DiscreteFourierFunction.Calculate LoopLimit - added new attribute MaximumExecutionTimeAttribute - replaced AbstractRegExASTVisitor.DetermineMaxTime by a new visitor RegExASTVisitorDetermineMaxTime
Revision 1.1 2005/10/11 22:31:12 helgeh *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:20 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.

PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorDetermineProbabilitiesAndMaxValue.#ctor(Palladio.RegularExpressions.IRegEx,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructor that also starts the visitor.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorDetermineProbabilitiesAndMaxValue.MaxTime
member.summary: Maximum execution time of the result of the calculation.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorDetermineProbabilitiesAndMaxValue.Samplingrate
member.summary: Samplingrate of the result of the calculation.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorFrequencyDomain
member.summary:
Visits each node of the abstract syntax tree of a regular expression and determines its total time consumption. The calculation of the performance uses the fourier transformation.
Therefore, serveral requirements must be fullfilled: - each input symbol must contain a RandomVariable attribute. - each input symbol must contain a ProbabilityAttribute

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log: RegExASTVisitorFrequencyDomain.cs,v $ Revision 1.2 2005/12/04 18:41:21 helgeh - Simplified DiscreteFourierFunction.Calculate LoopLimit - added new attribute MaximumExecutionTimeAttribute - replaced AbstractRegExASTVisitor.DetermineMaxTime by a new visitor RegExASTVisitorDetermineMaxTime
Revision 1.1 2005/10/11 22:31:12 helgeh *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:20 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorFrequencyDomain.#ctor(Palladio.RegularExpressions.IRegEx,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructor that also starts the visitor. The Visitor walks through the AST in depth-first order.
member.param: The root node of the abstract syntax tree.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorFrequencyDomain.DetermineMaxTimeAndSamplingRate(Palladio.RegularExpressions.IRegEx,System.Double)
member.summary: Starts a visitor, that computes the probabilities of each expression and determines the maximum x-value of the resulting function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorFrequencyDomain.VisitIAlternative(Palladio.RegularExpressions.IAlternative)
member.summary: Computes the weighted sum of the two alternatives.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorFrequencyDomain.VisitISequence(Palladio.RegularExpressions.ISequence)
member.summary: Computes the convolution of the predecessor und the successor of the sequence.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorFrequencyDomain.VisitISymbol(Palladio.RegularExpressions.ISymbol)
member.summary: Nothing has to be done when a Symbol is visited. A Symbol must have a RandomVariable.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain
member.summary:
Visits each node of the abstract syntax tree of a regular expression and determins its total time consumption. The Computation of the time consumption uses vector-multiplication for all computations.
Therefore, serveral requirements must be fullfilled: - each input symbol must contain a RandomVariable attribute. - each input symbol must contain a ProbabilityAttribute

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log: RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain.cs,v $ Revision 1.1 2005/10/11 22:31:12 helgeh *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:20 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain.#ctor(Palladio.RegularExpressions.IRegEx,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructor that also starts the visitor. The Visitor walks through the AST in depth-first order.
member.param: The root node of the abstract syntax tree.
A threashhold for the computation of the loop.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain.VisitIAlternative(Palladio.RegularExpressions.IAlternative)
member.summary: Computes the weighted sum of the two alternatives.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain.VisitISequence(Palladio.RegularExpressions.ISequence)
member.summary: Computes the convolution of the predecessor und the successor of the sequence. If the two functions do not have the same sampling rate, the samplingrate must be adjusted.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain.VisitILoop(Palladio.RegularExpressions.ILoop)
member.summary: Calculates the loop limit. The calculation will abort if the the maximum value of the i-th iteration is smaller than epsilon.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain.VisitISymbol(Palladio.RegularExpressions.ISymbol)
member.summary: Nothing has to be done when a Symbol is visited. A Symbol must have a RandomVariable.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.RegExVisitor.Visitor.RegExASTVisitorTimeDomain.AdjustSamplingRate(Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable@,Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable@)
member.summary: Adjusts the samplingrate of both RandomVariable to the same value.
